docs.lead_paragraph: Medicare and Medicaid data offer the best available window into health outcomes and costs. Now a part of that information is hidden.

headline.main: Addiction Research and Care Collide With Federal Privacy Rules
headline.sub: Testing if we still have subheds

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)

docs.lead_paragraph: A proposal in Hawaii's Legislature would expand a state mandate on fertility treatments to include same sex couples and single women, updating a law that now only offers such benefits to women who are married to men.

headline.main: Bill Seeks to Expand Coverage for Hawaii Fertility Law
headline.print_headline: Bill Seeks to Expand Coverage for Hawaii Fertility Law

docs.snippet: A proposal in Hawaii's Legislature would expand a state mandate on fertility treatments to include same sex couples and single women, updating a law that now only offers such benefits to women who are married to men.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican budget negotiators on Monday reached a compromise deal for the first joint House-Senate budget in six years, one that seeks to boost military spending while calling for deep cuts to social programs to eliminate deficits in a decade.

headline.main: Republicans Reach Deal for Budget Plan, Target Obamacare
headline.print_headline: Republicans Reach Deal for Budget Plan, Target Obamacare

docs.snippet: Republican budget negotiators on Monday reached a compromise deal for the first joint House-Senate budget in six years, one that seeks to boost military spending while calling for deep cuts to social programs to eliminate deficits in a decade.

docs.lead_paragraph: Reports about a Senate cafeteria worker who makes so little money he is homeless are prompting calls for change from Democrats on Capitol Hill.

headline.main: Admitted to Your Bedroom: Some Hospitals Try Treating Patients at Home

docs.abstract: Under pressure to reduce costs and improve quality, a handful of health care systems are hospitalizing patients in their homes.

docs.lead_paragraph: When the Nasdaq Composite last hit record highs during the dotcom era, fund manager Walter Price struggled with justifying paying 400 times a company's earnings for rapid growth.

docs.lead_paragraph: Financing constraints mean British private healthcare group Bupa [BUPAI.UL] only has around 200-300 million pounds available for acquisition in 2015, its chief executive said on Monday.

docs.lead_paragraph: House and Senate GOP negotiators neared agreement Monday on a budget blueprint that would enable Republicans controlling Congress to more easily target President Barack Obama's signature health care law while delivering an almost $40 billion budget boost to the Pentagon.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday revived religious objections by Catholic groups in Michigan and Tennessee to the Obamacare requirement for contraception coverage, throwing out a lower court decision favoring President Barack Obama's administration.

headline.main: U.S. Top Court Throws Out Obamacare Contraception Ruling
headline.print_headline: U.S. Top Court Throws Out Obamacare Contraception Ruling

docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday revived religious objections by Catholic groups in Michigan and Tennessee to the Obamacare requirement for contraception coverage, throwing out a lower court decision favoring President Barack Obama's administration.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a small town south of Beirut, Fawziyeh keeps her apartment immaculately clean despite its crumbling walls and the plastic sheets flapping across its windows. She shares the three-bedroom flat with 12 others including her five children – all, like her, refugees from Syria.

headline.main: Insight-Two Migrant Sisters From Syria, Now Worlds Apart
headline.print_headline: Insight-Two Migrant Sisters From Syria, Now Worlds Apart
